attributes.action: Restore the RAF Hornchurch Memorial Stone back to its original resting place.
attributes.additional_details:
There is a petition on change.org
https://www.change.org/p/havering-council-restore-the-raf-memorial-in-hornchurch-to-its-original-site?recruiter=361176116&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=facebook&utm_campaign=share_facebook_responsive&utm_term=des-lg-share_petition-no_msg&fb_ref=Default
where the public are asking for it to be put back.
A letter to the Romford Recorder from the late Ted Exall's son has also been sent saying that the family have not given there blessing
attributes.background: Through the work of the late Ted Exall a publicly funded memorial stone was erected in the grounds of the R J Mitchell school, it was placed where the gates once stood in memory of all that served at RAF Hornchurch, the stone has now been moved without real consultation to a less prominent site.

rejection.details:
Any decisions about the siting of memorials or statues are planning decisions made  by the local council rather than a matter for the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you have not already done so, you might want to start an e-petition on the Havering Council e-petition site:

http://epetition.havering.public-i.tv/epetition_core/community/page/index
